dialogues.text:
Processing...
You have obtained a second charge.

Until now, you could only use one ability and
wait for it to recharge. Now you can execute
two in a row.

WHAT?
Can I combine them or just repeat the same one?

Both options are valid.
However, avoid running out of charges in
critical situations.

I know you don't remember anything... but
this never happened before. So the suit
could always give metwo charges?

Negative... initially.
My records indicate that a version of the suit
with that feature was in preproduction.

However, its full implementation was expected
to take several years.

So, either we’re in the future... or this planet
activated something in the suit. I’ll take it as
an upgrade for now.
